summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the west 40 feet of Lots 9 and 10, Block 3, Bigelow's Addition and Lots 7 and 8, Block 1, Marvin's Capitol Hill Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-309 and 17-249, respectively.
